Html:
Is there any easy way to change the location of the pictures from the database to the file system on Final V.2. I do not have time to change to the V.3 yet, but hope to soon. On my current site it says database full and I am in desperate need to post pics.

Thanks.
I don't think there is a way. There might be a changeset you can go to. Just look for something like "initial photos on file system".

Do you have any other ideas for fixing this problem?

thanks.
dpr00
